entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight. A few wet flurries over southern sections early this evening. Local amount 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
